pr_title: fixes In nearby tab when back button is pressed nothing happen(#4096)

timeline.bodyText:
Could you please:

Write ! nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClicked() instead of nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClicked()==false (it is a usual convention)
Move the comment to the line before (so that no line is too long)

Thanks!
timeline.author: nicolas-raoul

timeline.message:
Adds more obvious display for limited connection mode (#4094)

* Limited connection is enabled layout is added

* Add a layout to indicate limited connection is active

* fix string

timeline.bodyText: Minor change: Could you please rephrase to: If function nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClick() returns false, it means that the bottomsheet is not expanded. So if the back button is pressed, then go back to the Contributions tab. Thanks!
timeline.author: nicolas-raoul

timeline.bodyText: Please replace the text of this comment with this text: If function nearbyParentFragment.backButtonClick() returns false, it means that the bottomsheet is not expanded. So if the back button is pressed, then go back to the Contributions tab
timeline.author: nicolas-raoul
